choices.A: Escalation processes, person responsible for communicating the information, glossary of common terminology, methods or technologies used to convey the information
choices.B: Phone book directory, stakeholder communication requirements, project charter, glossary of common terminology
choices.C: Organizational chart, escalation processes, person responsible for communicating the information, project management plan, glossary of common terminology
choices.D: Glossary of common terminology, constraints derived from specific legislation and regulation, person responsible for communicating information, project management plan, resource management plan

discussion.content:
The tip for this question (and questions like it) is for you to identify the wrong piece of each of the wrong answers:
- B says "project charter" which is an input, not part of the output of comms. management plan as well as phone book directory, which is likely an OPA (also an input)
- C says organizational chart, an OPA (an input), as well as project management plan (an input as well)
- D says project management plan and resource management plan (subset of the overall project management plan); these are both inputs as well.

Process of elimination provides you with A. These all are aspects of the comms management plan (there 's many on page 377 of PMBOK).
Key here is 'methods or technologies used to convey the information'

questions.question_text: Which of the following set of elements is part of an effective communications management plan?

discussion.content:
The correct answer is:
Manage Stakeholder: Executing 
Identify Stakeholder: Initiating
Plan: Planning 
Monitor: Monitoring and controlling

questions.question_text:
DRAG DROP -
Match each process in Project Stakeholder Management with its associated Process Group.
Select and Place:
//IMG//
Which is the order of steps in the Procurement Management process?

choices.C: Controlling procurements, identifying and planning procurement requirements, obtaining quotes or proposals, negotiating with vendors, and contracting with selected vendors.
choices.B: Identifying and planning procurement requirements, negotiating with vendors, contracting with selected vendors, obtaining quotes or proposals, and controlling procurements.
choices.A: Identifying and planning procurement requirements, obtaining quotes or proposals, negotiating with vendors, contracting with selected vendors, and controlling procurements.
choices.D: Obtaining quotes or proposals, identifying and planning procurement requirements, negotiating with vendors, contracting with selected vendors, and controlling procurements.

comments.content: oops. forget that comment above lol. It's about the order, not the content.

discussion.content: A and B are the same answer choice.

Selected Answer: A
Two variables, with the process/activity on one axis and the defect on another axis. Then you plot the scatter "point" to show the relationship.

questions.question_text: Which is the appropriate tool to identify the possible correlation between two elements in a process?
What process is included in Project Integration Management?
